channel.title: 4G on Embedded Art
channel.description: Recent content in 4G on Embedded Art

item.title: IOT Gateway 4G Modbus
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: IOT Gateway 4G Modbus Industrial IoT (Internet of Things) Gateway Description : Modbus RTU (RS485) to GPRS(MQTT) Gateway is Reliable, Flexible and Plug-n-play device to fetch data Over Modbus RTU and send them to cloud using MQTT protocol over GPRS Network. Device has WiFi and Bluetooth and GPS functionality. Multiple Modbus RTU transactions can be configured using SMS or From cloud to fetch data from variety of Modbus supported devices like Energymeter, Temperature scanner etc.
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar

item.title: EC20 4G GSM Modem AT Command
item.author: info@embeddedart.in (brijesh khokhar)
item.description: EC20 AT COMMAND Note : at end of every AT command add (0x0D) to terminate command. Commands are usually followed by a response that includes “”. AT+QURCCFG Configure URC Indication Option AT+QURCCFG=? AT+QURCCFG="urcport","uart1" this command will show URC indication on main UART port. Configuration of URC output port will be saved to NV immediately by default. After URC output port is set successfully, it will take effect immediately. AT+CLIP Calling Line Identification Presentation
item.dc:creator: brijesh khokhar
